system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:
Use the trimmed evidence below to populate the JSON. Omit any fields that lack evidence. Do not include null attributes.{"identity": {"museum_name": "Colorado Springs Fine Arts Center", "city": "Colorado Springs", "state_province": "Colorado", "country": "USA", "website": "http://www.csfineartscenter.org", "primary_domain": "Art"}, "state_record": {"museum_type": "ART MUSEUM", "city_tier": 2, "time_needed": "Half day"}, "website_text_snippet": "[__Tickets](/tickets/) [__Contact](/contact/) [__Events](/visit/events/) [__Colorado College](https://www.coloradocollege.edu)
## Join us for Spark! A Night of Creativity on Jan. 31, 6–9 p.m.
Get ready to relive your childhood at Spark—an after-hours adventure where grown-ups get to play! [Get Tickets](https://fac.coloradocollege.edu/events/spark/)
## A New Year Means New Ways to Get Creative!
Whether you’re picking up a brush for the first time or rediscovering a favorite hobby, our classes are designed to inspire and welcome artists of all levels. [Browse Classes](https://artschool.csfineartscenter.org/classes/)
## The Roommate live on stage Feb. 12–March 1
This funny and deeply moving play—recently seen on Broadway—examines the complexities that arise between two very different women and how they navigate changing senses of identity, relevance, and the possibility of reinvention. [Get"}

## Join us for Spark! A Night of Creativity on Jan. 31, 6–9 p.m.
Get ready to relive your childhood at Spark—an after-hours adventure where grown-ups get to play! [Get Tickets](https://fac.coloradocollege.edu/events/spark/)
## A New Year Means New Ways to Get Creative!
Whether you’re picking up a brush for the first time or rediscovering a favorite hobby, our classes are designed to inspire and welcome artists of all levels. [Browse Classes](https://artschool.csfineartscenter.org/classes/)
## The Roommate live on stage Feb. 12–March 1
This funny and deeply moving play—recently seen on Broadway—examines the complexities that arise between two very different women and how they navigate changing senses of identity, relevance, and the possibility of reinvention. [Get Tickets](https://fac.coloradocollege.edu/theatre-events/the-roommate/)
